thread.section_title: GoDaddy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoDaddy | www.godaddy.com | 3 of 119
thread.title: kerry

author: kerry
title: kerry
text: staff use terms such as 'what?' in defence when asked questions, then give blunt rude replies and cut off your chats when they dont know the answers to your questions. I was enquiring about their services before purchasing from them, when you would think they would be on their best behaviour trying to sell to you and take your money, so god knows what their like after they already have your money. A guy named 'Jarad' dealt with me. I wont be purchasing anything from godaddy.
